effect.diamond-pearl: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.platinum: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.

short_effect.diamond-pearl: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.platinum: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.platinum: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
